description:
Get the coolest wallet in the world, and a tracker card - Ekster. Go to https://partner.ekster.com/laowhy86 and use the code LAOWHY86 at checkout for a massive discount.

China's economy is on the brink... and the government is doing crazy stuff as a reaction. 

◘ Support me on Patreon to talk to me directly and support my work - http://www.patreon.com/laowhy86

◘ Weekly Live show The China Show - https://www.youtube.com/@TheChinaShow

My documentaries -

title: China Has Just Banned Rich People Without Warning
